name: biomni-interspecies-gene-conversion
title: Biomni: Interspecies Gene Conversion
description: Convert ENSEMBL gene IDs between different species using BioMart homology mapping
content:
Overview

Converts ENSEMBL gene IDs from one species to their homologous counterparts in another species using the Ensembl BioMart database. The conversion is based on one-to-one ortholog mappings.

Supported Species

  • human, mouse, rat, zebrafish
  • fly/drosophila, worm, yeast
  • chicken, pig, cow, dog, macaque

Input Format

Upload a JSON file containing an array of ENSEMBL gene IDs, e.g., ["ENSG00000007372", "ENSG00000181449"]

Output

CSV file with source and target gene mappings
command: rm -rf prod_apps 2>/dev/null || true && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps && python3 prod_apps/biomni/genomics/interspecies_gene_conversion.py "${geneListFile}" --source-species "${sourceSpecies}" --target-species "${targetSpecies}" -o "${outputDir}"
